SVGTutorialGradients.summary: Perhaps more exciting than just fills and strokes is the fact that you can also create and apply gradients as either fills or strokes.

remarks.para: There are two types of SVG gradients: linear and radial. They are defined separately from where they are used, which promotes reusability. You must give each gradient an id attribute to allow other elements to reference it. Gradient definitions can be placed in a 'defs' element or an 'svg' element.
